WorkItem.Description: I can't extract this new release version (v1.3.1309.15) using the windows built-in zip. I have to use 7-zip in order to extract it without errors. If this is normal then disregard this issue. :)

Comments.Message:
You are right. The build-in zip tool of Windows can't unzip the last release. I personnaly use 7-zip to create the package I publish on Codeplex. I may have modified a compression option that isn't compatible with Windows. I will re-create the package after work.
Sorry for the inconvenient.
